alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 13 at 1:18AM MST until November 13 at 7:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Oglala Lakota County, Bennett County, Southern Oglala Lakota County and Southern Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota
